about_the_game:
Iron Frontier is a roguelike card strategy game. Your job is to build and defend your base against enemy forces. The enemy relies on superior numbers. However with dozens of upgrades at your disposal you can set up a kill zone! With each battle you earn resources that will make your army permanently stronger. Rally your troops, find the best tactics and defeat the enemy hordes!



Establish a base and build your defenses. There won't be long before an enemy attack. The enemy grows stronger with each wave. However by destroying enemy forces you unlock new units, structures and upgrades. Find the best combination of synergetic abilities to break the game and annihilate the enemy! After the battle you can spend acquired resources to purchase permanent upgrades to make your army invincible!

FEATURES

  • A unique blend of strategy, card game and roguelike genres
  • An ever-growing roster of units, structures and commanders to unlock and send into battle
  • A huge amount of synergetic abilities to destroy the enemy
  • Permanent upgrades for your army
